museum|ArtifactsCore|ArtRegistry: CHAR(10) PRIMARY KEY uniquely identifying each artifact record (e.g., 'ART000012').
museum|ArtifactsCore|ArtName: VARCHAR(100) providing the artifact’s name or label (free text, no strict list).
museum|ArtifactsCore|ArtDynasty: VARCHAR(50) indicating the historical period/era/dynasty (e.g., 'Ming', 'Song', 'Qing', 'Han', 'Tang', 'Yuan'). No strict enumeration.
museum|ArtifactsCore|ArtAgeYears: INT denoting the artifact’s approximate age in years (any integer value).
museum|ArtifactsCore|MatType: CHAR(30) showing the artifact’s primary material (e.g., 'Stone', 'Textile', 'Bronze', 'Jade', 'Wood', 'Ceramic', 'Paper'). Could be enumerated by your policy but often open-ended.
museum|ArtifactsCore|ConserveStatus: VARCHAR(150) describing the artifact’s current conservation condition. Possible values might include 'Excellent', 'Good', 'Fair', 'Poor', 'Critical'.
museum|ArtifactRatings|RatingRecordRegis: BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY, unique ID for each rating record.
museum|ArtifactRatings|ArtRef: CHAR(10) FOREIGN KEY referencing ArtifactsCore(ArtRegistry). Links the record to a specific artifact.
museum|ArtifactRatings|HistSignRating: SMALLINT rating for historical significance (scale is flexible).
museum|ArtifactRatings|ResearchValRating: INT rating for research value (range is flexible).
museum|ArtifactRatings|ExhibitValRating: INT rating evaluating the artifact’s exhibition value (scale is flexible).
museum|ArtifactRatings|CultScore: SMALLINT measuring the artifact’s cultural importance (common range or flexible scale).
museum|ArtifactRatings|PublicAccessRatin: SMALLINT rating the artifact’s public accessibility or appeal (scale is flexible).
museum|ArtifactRatings|EduValueRating: BIGINT rating for how much educational value the artifact provides (scale is flexible).
museum|ArtifactRatings|ConserveDiff: VARCHAR(100) describing difficulty in conserving the artifact (possible values: 'Medium', 'High', 'Low').
museum|ArtifactRatings|MatStability: VARCHAR(30) for material stability classification (possible values: 'Unstable', 'Stable', 'Moderate').
museum|ArtifactRatings|DeteriorRate: TEXT field detailing the specific deterioration rate or pattern (e.g., 'Moderate', 'Rapid', 'Slow').
museum|SensitivityData|SensitivityRegist: BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY, unique ID for each record of sensitivity details.
museum|SensitivityData|EnvSensitivity: CHAR(20) for overall environmental sensitivity (possible values: 'Low', 'High', 'Medium').
museum|SensitivityData|HumiditySensitivi: TEXT detailing humidity requirements or maximum humidity tolerance (possible values: 'Medium', 'High', 'Low').
museum|SensitivityData|PollutantSensitiv: VARCHAR(100) indicating susceptibility to pollutants (possible values: 'High', 'Medium', 'Low').
museum|SensitivityData|PestSensitivity: TEXT describing vulnerability to pests (possible values: 'High', 'Low', 'Medium').
museum|SensitivityData|TransportSensitiv: VARCHAR(50) specifying special packaging needs (possible values: 'High', 'Low', 'Medium').
museum|SensitivityData|DisplaySensitivit: VARCHAR(120) noting special display requirements (possible values: 'Low', 'High', 'Medium').
museum|ExhibitionHalls|HallRegistry: CHAR(8) PRIMARY KEY uniquely identifying each exhibition hall (e.g., 'HALL0001').
museum|ExhibitionHalls|CCTVCoverage: VARCHAR(100) describing the CCTV coverage (possible values: 'Partial', 'Full', 'Limited').
museum|ExhibitionHalls|MotionDetectStatu: VARCHAR(50) summarizing motion detection status (possible values: 'Active', 'Maintenance', 'Partial').
museum|ExhibitionHalls|AlarmSysStatus: CHAR(15) for alarm system status (possible values: 'Armed', 'Maintenance', 'Partial').
museum|ExhibitionHalls|AccessCtrlStatus: VARCHAR(80) describing the level of access control (possible values: 'Maintenance', 'Active', 'Partial').
museum|ExhibitionHalls|VisitorCountDaily: INT representing the typical or observed daily visitor count (unbounded integer).
museum|ExhibitionHalls|VisitorFlowRate: SMALLINT indicating how many visitors pass through (possible values: 'Low', 'Medium', 'High').
museum|ExhibitionHalls|VisitorDwellMin: SMALLINT specifying the average dwell time (in minutes) per visitor.
museum|ExhibitionHalls|VisitorBehaviorNo: TEXT field for any additional notes on visitor behaviors, traffic patterns, or compliance issues.
museum|Showcases|ShowcaseReg: CHAR(12) PRIMARY KEY for identifying each showcase (e.g., 'SHOW00000012').
museum|Showcases|HallRef: CHAR(8) FOREIGN KEY referencing ExhibitionHalls(HallRegistry). Connects the showcase to a particular hall.
museum|Showcases|Airtightness: REAL measuring the physical seal quality, often tested as a numeric rating or leakage rate.
museum|Showcases|ShowcaseMaterial: VARCHAR(80) describing the material (possible values: 'Tempered Glass', 'Glass', 'Acrylic').
museum|Showcases|SealCondition: VARCHAR(30) indicating the seal’s condition (possible values: 'Poor', 'Excellent', 'Good', 'Fair').
museum|Showcases|MaintStatus: CHAR(15) for the showcase’s maintenance status (possible values: 'Overdue', 'Due', 'Good').
museum|Showcases|FilterStatus: TEXT detailing installed filters (possible values: 'Replace Now', 'Replace Soon', 'Clean').
museum|Showcases|SilicaGelStatus: CHAR(20) noting the condition of silica gel (possible values: 'Active', 'Replace Soon', 'Replace Now').
museum|Showcases|SilicaGelChangeDate: DATE of the last silica gel replacement or recharge.
museum|Showcases|HumidityBufferCap: SMALLINT rating or index of the showcase’s capacity to buffer humidity.
museum|Showcases|PollutantAbsorbCap: NUMERIC(5,2) for the pollutant absorption capacity (quantity or threshold).
museum|Showcases|LeakRate: REAL specifying the rate of air leakage, often tested to ensure stable internal conditions.
museum|Showcases|PressurePa: BIGINT capturing the internal pressure (in pascals) if pressurization is used.
museum|Showcases|InertGasSysStatus: VARCHAR(50) describing any inert gas system status (possible values: 'Active', 'Standby', 'Maintenance').
museum|Showcases|FireSuppressSys: VARCHAR(50) summarizing fire suppression condition (possible values: 'Maintenance', 'Active', 'Standby').
museum|Showcases|EmPowerStatus: CHAR(10) indicating emergency power readiness (possible values: 'Testing', 'Active', 'Standby').
museum|Showcases|BackupSysStatus: TEXT describing any backup systems (possible values: 'Ready', 'Maintenance', 'Testing') and their condition.
museum|EnvironmentalReadingsCore|EnvRead: BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY, uniquely identifying each environmental reading record.
museum|EnvironmentalReadingsCore|Monitor: CHAR(10) identifier for the monitoring device or sensor (e.g., 'MON000001').
museum|EnvironmentalReadingsCore|ReadTim: TIMESTAMP NOT NULL indicating the date and time the reading was recorded.
museum|EnvironmentalReadingsCore|Showcas: CHAR(12) FOREIGN KEY referencing Showcases(ShowcaseReg), linking the reading to a specific showcase being monitored.
museum|EnvironmentalReadingsCore|TempC: SMALLINT representing the measured temperature in Celsius.
museum|EnvironmentalReadingsCore|TempVar: REAL showing the 24-hour variation in temperature (in °C).
museum|EnvironmentalReadingsCore|RelHumi: INT capturing the relative humidity percentage (0–100).
museum|EnvironmentalReadingsCore|HumVar2: SMALLINT indicating the 24-hour variation in humidity (percentage points).
museum|EnvironmentalReadingsCore|AirPres: REAL specifying the measured air pressure in hectopascals (hPa).
museum|AirQualityReadings|AQRecordRegist: BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY, uniquely identifying each air-quality reading record.
museum|AirQualityReadings|EnvReadRef: BIGINT FOREIGN KEY referencing EnvironmentalReadingsCore(EnvReadRegistry). Links this record to its main environmental reading.
museum|AirQualityReadings|CO2ppm: SMALLINT measuring CO2 concentration in parts per million (ppm). Typical range: 300–2000.
museum|AirQualityReadings|TVOCppb: INT capturing total volatile organic compounds in parts per billion (ppb).
museum|AirQualityReadings|OzonePpb: INT indicating ozone concentration in ppb.
museum|AirQualityReadings|SO2ppb: SMALLINT for sulfur dioxide concentration in ppb.
museum|AirQualityReadings|NO2ppb: BIGINT for nitrogen dioxide concentration in ppb.
museum|AirQualityReadings|PM25Conc: REAL measuring particulate matter (PM2.5) in µg/m³ or a similar metric.
museum|AirQualityReadings|PM10Conc: NUMERIC(5,2) measuring PM10 concentration, possibly µg/m³ as well.
museum|AirQualityReadings|HCHOConc: NUMERIC(7,4) for formaldehyde (HCHO) concentration (e.g., mg/m³ or another scale).
museum|AirQualityReadings|AirExRate: NUMERIC(4,1) indicating air exchange rate (e.g., air changes per hour).
museum|AirQualityReadings|AirVelMs: NUMERIC(5,2) capturing air velocity in meters per second (m/s).
museum|SurfaceAndPhysicalReadings|SurfPh: BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY, unique ID for each surface/physical reading record.
museum|SurfaceAndPhysicalReadings|EnvRea: BIGINT FOREIGN KEY referencing EnvironmentalReadingsCore(EnvReadRegistry). Ties surface data to a general environment reading.
museum|SurfaceAndPhysicalReadings|VibraL: REAL measuring vibration level in mm/s² (millimeters per second squared).
museum|SurfaceAndPhysicalReadings|NoiseD: SMALLINT capturing noise level in decibels (dB).
museum|SurfaceAndPhysicalReadings|DustAc: NUMERIC(5,2) for dust accumulation in milligrams per square meter (mg/m²).
museum|SurfaceAndPhysicalReadings|Microb: INT counting colony-forming units (CFU) of microbes on surfaces.
museum|SurfaceAndPhysicalReadings|MoldRi: NUMERIC(4,2) representing a calculated mold risk index (e.g., 0–10).
museum|SurfaceAndPhysicalReadings|PestAc: VARCHAR(50) noting observed pest activity (could be enumerations like 'Medium', 'Low', 'High').
museum|SurfaceAndPhysicalReadings|PestTr: SMALLINT indicating how many pests were caught in traps (if applicable).
museum|SurfaceAndPhysicalReadings|PestSp: TEXT listing pest species observed or identified (e.g., 'Beetles', 'Booklice', 'Moths', 'Silverfish').
museum|SurfaceAndPhysicalReadings|Surfac: NUMERIC(3,1) measuring pH on the artifact’s surface.
museum|SurfaceAndPhysicalReadings|MatMoi: NUMERIC(4,2) for the material’s moisture content in percentage (0–100%).
museum|SurfaceAndPhysicalReadings|SaltCr: CHAR(20) describing risk of salt crystallization (possible values: 'High', 'Low', 'Medium').
museum|SurfaceAndPhysicalReadings|MetalC: NUMERIC(4,2) capturing corrosion rate for metal surfaces, e.g., mg/cm² per day.
museum|SurfaceAndPhysicalReadings|Organi: NUMERIC(4,2) measuring potential organic degradation (e.g., 0–10 scale).
museum|SurfaceAndPhysicalReadings|ColorC: REAL indicating color change (Delta E) measurement.
museum|SurfaceAndPhysicalReadings|Surfac: NUMERIC(5,2) temperature of the surface in Celsius.
NUMERIC(4,1) relative humidity at the surface (percentage).
museum|SurfaceAndPhysicalReadings|Conden: VARCHAR(60) describing condensation risk level (possible values: 'Medium', 'High', 'Low').
museum|SurfaceAndPhysicalReadings|Therma: CHAR(15) summarizing thermal imaging results (possible values: 'Normal', 'Critical', 'Attention Required').
museum|SurfaceAndPhysicalReadings|Struct: VARCHAR(50) describing structural stability (possible values: 'Stable', 'Minor Issues', 'Major Issues').
museum|SurfaceAndPhysicalReadings|CrackM: TEXT field noting crack monitoring details (possible values: 'Significant Changes', 'Minor Changes', 'No Changes').
museum|SurfaceAndPhysicalReadings|Deform: NUMERIC(5,2) measuring any deformation in millimeters.
museum|SurfaceAndPhysicalReadings|WtChan: NUMERIC(6,5) capturing weight change in percentage (e.g., 0.00001–99.99999).
museum|SurfaceAndPhysicalReadings|SurfDu: SMALLINT representing the percentage of surface area covered by dust (0–100%).
museum|SurfaceAndPhysicalReadings|O2Conc: NUMERIC(4,2) measuring oxygen concentration (e.g., 21.00% for normal air).
museum|SurfaceAndPhysicalReadings|N2Conc: NUMERIC(4,2) measuring nitrogen concentration (often ~78.00% in air).
museum|LightAndRadiationReadings|LightRa: BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY, uniquely identifying each light/radiation reading.
museum|LightAndRadiationReadings|EnvRead: BIGINT FOREIGN KEY referencing EnvironmentalReadingsCore(EnvReadRegistry). Associates light data with an existing environment reading.
museum|LightAndRadiationReadings|LightLu: INT measuring visible light intensity in lux.
museum|LightAndRadiationReadings|UVuWcm2: NUMERIC(6,2) capturing UV radiation in microwatts per cm² (µW/cm²).
museum|LightAndRadiationReadings|IRWm2: NUMERIC(6,2) measuring infrared radiation in W/m².
museum|LightAndRadiationReadings|Visible: INT indicating total visible light exposure over time in lux-hours (Lx·h).
museum|ConditionAssessments|ConditionAss: BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY, unique ID for each condition assessment record.
museum|ConditionAssessments|ArtRefExamin: TEXT NOT NULL FOREIGN KEY referencing ArtifactsCore(ArtRegistry). Links to the artifact under assessment. (In practice, should match CHAR(10) type if needed.)
museum|ConditionAssessments|ShowcaseRefE: TEXT FOREIGN KEY referencing Showcases(ShowcaseReg). Ties the record to the showcase if it was part of the assessment.
museum|ConditionAssessments|LightReadRef: BIGINT FOREIGN KEY referencing LightAndRadiationReadings(LightRadRegistry). Associates the assessment with relevant light data.
museum|ConditionAssessments|CondAssessSc: INT rating or score representing the artifact/showcase condition (scale is flexible).
museum|ConditionAssessments|ConserveAsse: DATE when the conservation assessment took place.
museum|ConditionAssessments|NextAssessDu: DATE by which the next condition assessment should occur.
museum|RiskAssessments|RiskAssessRegistr: A BIGSERIAL primary key uniquely identifying each risk assessment record.
museum|RiskAssessments|ArtRefConcerned: A CHAR(10) NOT NULL foreign key referencing ArtifactsCore(ArtRegistry), linking this record to a specific artifact.
museum|RiskAssessments|HallRefConcerned: A CHAR(8) foreign key referencing ExhibitionHalls(HallRegistry), indicating which hall is involved in this risk assessment (if any).
museum|RiskAssessments|RiskAssessLevel: A VARCHAR(50) describing the level of risk (possible values: 'Medium', 'High', 'Low').
museum|RiskAssessments|EmergResponsePlan: A TEXT field outlining the emergency response procedures if the risk materializes (possible values: 'Review Required', 'Under Revision', 'Updated').
museum|RiskAssessments|EvacPriority: A CHAR(15) indicating the priority for evacuation (possible values: 'Priority 3', 'Priority 1', 'Priority 2').
museum|RiskAssessments|HandleRestriction: A VARCHAR(100) describing any handling restrictions (possible values: 'Minimal', 'Strict').
museum|RiskAssessments|ConservePriorityS: A SMALLINT rating (e.g., 1–10) indicating the urgency or priority for conservation actions based on identified risks.
museum|ConservationAndMaintenance|Conser: A BIGSERIAL primary key uniquely identifying each record of conservation and maintenance.
museum|ConservationAndMaintenance|ArtRef: A CHAR(10) NOT NULL foreign key referencing ArtifactsCore(ArtRegistry). Ties this record to the maintained artifact.
museum|ConservationAndMaintenance|HallRe: A CHAR(8) foreign key referencing ExhibitionHalls(HallRegistry), if the conservation applies to a specific hall area.
museum|ConservationAndMaintenance|SurfRe: A BIGINT foreign key referencing SurfaceAndPhysicalReadings(SurfPhysRegistry). Links to surface/physical readings used in this maintenance record.
museum|ConservationAndMaintenance|Conser: A VARCHAR(50) describing the status of conservation treatment (possible values: 'In Progress', 'Not Required', 'Scheduled').
museum|ConservationAndMaintenance|TreatP: A CHAR(10) indicating the priority of the treatment (possible values: 'High', 'Medium', 'Low', 'Urgent').
museum|ConservationAndMaintenance|LastCl: A DATE specifying the last cleaning date of the artifact/hall/showcase.
museum|ConservationAndMaintenance|NextCl: A DATE indicating when the next cleaning is scheduled or recommended.
museum|ConservationAndMaintenance|CleanI: A SMALLINT capturing the recommended cleaning interval in days.
museum|ConservationAndMaintenance|MaintL: A TEXT field describing any notes, log details, or issues encountered during maintenance activities (possible values: 'Updated', 'Pending', 'Review').
museum|ConservationAndMaintenance|Incide: A VARCHAR(50) summarizing the status of any incident reports (possible values: 'Closed', 'Open').
museum|ConservationAndMaintenance|Emerge: A CHAR(15) indicating whether emergency drills are 'Current', 'Overdue', 'Due', etc.
museum|ConservationAndMaintenance|StaffT: A VARCHAR(20) describing staff training status (possible values: 'Current', 'Overdue', 'Due').
museum|ConservationAndMaintenance|Budget: A VARCHAR(50) describing budget allocation status (possible values: 'Review Required', 'Insufficient', 'Adequate').
museum|ConservationAndMaintenance|MaintB: A CHAR(15) indicating if the current maintenance budget is 'Limited', 'Depleted', 'Available', etc.
museum|ConservationAndMaintenance|Conser: A VARCHAR(30) describing the frequency of conservation efforts (possible values: 'Rare', 'Occasional', 'Frequent').
museum|ConservationAndMaintenance|Interv: A TEXT field detailing the intervention or treatment history (possible values: 'Extensive', 'Minimal', 'Moderate').
museum|ConservationAndMaintenance|PrevTr: A SMALLINT counting how many significant treatments have been done previously on this artifact/hall.
museum|ConservationAndMaintenance|TreatE: A VARCHAR(100) summarizing how effective previous treatments were (possible values: 'Low', 'Medium', 'High').
museum|ConservationAndMaintenance|Revers: A TEXT field describing if and how treatments can be reversed (possible values: 'Medium', 'High', 'Low').
museum|UsageRecords|UsageRecordRegistry: A BIGSERIAL primary key uniquely identifying each usage record.
museum|UsageRecords|ArtRefUsed: A CHAR(10) NOT NULL foreign key referencing ArtifactsCore(ArtRegistry), indicating which artifact is being used.
museum|UsageRecords|ShowcaseRefUsed: A CHAR(12) foreign key referencing Showcases(ShowcaseReg) if a showcase is involved in the usage.
museum|UsageRecords|SensDataLink: A BIGINT foreign key referencing SensitivityData(SensitivityRegistry). Links usage requirements to known sensitivities.
museum|UsageRecords|DisplayRotateSched: A CHAR(20) describing how often the artifact is rotated (possible values: 'Permanent', 'Resting', 'Active').
museum|UsageRecords|DisplayDurMonths: A SMALLINT indicating how many months the artifact is displayed in a single rotation.
museum|UsageRecords|RestPeriodMonths: A SMALLINT for how many months the artifact rests between rotations.
museum|UsageRecords|DisplayReqs: A VARCHAR(120) listing any special display requirements (possible values: 'Special', 'Standard', 'Custom').
museum|UsageRecords|StorageReqs: A VARCHAR(60) describing special storage requirements (possible values: 'Standard', 'Custom', 'Special').
museum|UsageRecords|HandlingReqs: A VARCHAR(80) specifying guidelines for handling (possible values: 'Custom', 'Special', 'Standard').
museum|UsageRecords|TransportReqs: A TEXT field detailing transport requirements (possible values: 'Custom', 'Special', 'Standard').
museum|UsageRecords|PackingReqs: A VARCHAR(90) summarizing packing methods (possible values: 'Custom', 'Special', 'Standard').
museum|UsageRecords|ResAccessFreq: A CHAR(10) indicating how often the artifact is accessed for research (possible values: 'Frequent', 'Rare', 'Occasional').
museum|UsageRecords|PublicDispFreq: A CHAR(15) describing how often the artifact goes on public display (possible values: 'Frequent', 'Occasional', 'Rare').
museum|UsageRecords|LoanFreq: A CHAR(12) specifying how frequently the artifact is loaned out (possible values: 'Occasional', 'Frequent', 'Rare').
museum|UsageRecords|HandleFreq: A CHAR(10) indicating how frequently the artifact is handled (possible values: 'Rare', 'Frequent', 'Occasional').
museum|UsageRecords|DocuFreq: A VARCHAR(20) describing how often documentation is updated (possible values: 'Frequent', 'Rare', 'Occasional').
museum|UsageRecords|MonitorFreq: A VARCHAR(35) for how often the artifact is monitored (possible values: 'Monthly', 'Daily', 'Weekly').
museum|UsageRecords|AssessFreq: A CHAR(15) for the frequency of condition assessments (possible values: 'Monthly', 'Quarterly', 'Annually').
museum|UsageRecords|MaintFreq: A CHAR(15) indicating the maintenance schedule (possible values: 'Monthly', 'Weekly', 'Quarterly').
museum|UsageRecords|InspectFreq: A CHAR(15) describing the routine inspection frequency (possible values: 'Weekly', 'Monthly', 'Daily').
museum|UsageRecords|CalibFreq: A CHAR(15) stating how often instruments are calibrated (possible values: 'Monthly', 'Quarterly', 'Annually').
museum|UsageRecords|CertStatus: A VARCHAR(40) noting any certification status (possible values: 'Expired', 'Current', 'Pending').
museum|UsageRecords|AuditStatus: A CHAR(10) indicating the result of a related audit (possible values: 'Passed', 'Pending', 'Failed').
museum|UsageRecords|QualityCtrlStatus: A VARCHAR(70) describing quality control status (possible values: 'Failed', 'Passed', 'Review').
museum|ArtifactSecurityAccess|SecRecordR: A BIGSERIAL primary key uniquely identifying each artifact security/access record.
museum|ArtifactSecurityAccess|ArtRef: A CHAR(10) NOT NULL foreign key referencing ArtifactsCore(ArtRegistry). Links this security record to a specific artifact.
museum|ArtifactSecurityAccess|RatingRef: A BIGINT foreign key referencing ArtifactRatings(RatingRecordRegistry). Associates this security record with a particular artifact rating, if relevant.
museum|ArtifactSecurityAccess|LoanStatus: A CHAR(15) indicating the artifact’s loan status (possible values: 'On Loan', 'Available', 'Not Available').
museum|ArtifactSecurityAccess|InsValueUS: A NUMERIC(15,2) specifying the artifact’s insured value in USD.
museum|ArtifactSecurityAccess|SecLevel: A VARCHAR(50) describing the security level (possible values: 'Level 3', 'Level 2', 'Level 1').
museum|ArtifactSecurityAccess|AccessRest: A TEXT field detailing constraints on handling/viewing (possible values: 'Public', 'Restricted', 'Limited').
museum|ArtifactSecurityAccess|DocuStatus: A VARCHAR(60) indicating the completeness of documentation (possible values: 'Updating', 'Partial', 'Complete').
museum|ArtifactSecurityAccess|PhotoDocu: A VARCHAR(100) noting photographic documentation status (possible values: 'Outdated', 'Required', 'Recent').
museum|ArtifactSecurityAccess|CondReport: A VARCHAR(80) describing the artifact’s condition report status (possible values: 'Current', 'Due', 'Overdue').
museum|ArtifactSecurityAccess|ConserveRe: A CHAR(20) summarizing conservation record status (possible values: 'Review Required', 'Pending', 'Updated').
museum|ArtifactSecurityAccess|ResearchAc: A VARCHAR(40) indicating if the artifact is open to researchers (possible values: 'Limited', 'Available', 'Restricted').
museum|ArtifactSecurityAccess|DigitalRec: A TEXT field specifying any digital records or scans (possible values: 'In Progress', 'Partial', 'Complete').
